body_html:
We encourage users to stay with the two latest versions of TF.
Especially if they are building from source.

As for branches, just like @skye mentioned, as soon as we cut a branch we stop developing on that.
any release before the last release (1.12) will only release critical security patches, nothing else will be patched in old release branches.
body_text:
We encourage users to stay with the two latest versions of TF.
Especially if they are building from source.
As for branches, just like @skye mentioned, as soon as we cut a branch we stop developing on that.
any release before the last release (1.12) will only release critical security patches, nothing else will be patched in old release branches.
body:
We encourage users to stay with the two latest versions of TF.
Especially if they are building from source.

As for branches, just like @skye mentioned, as soon as we cut a branch we stop developing on that.
any release before the last release (1.12) will only release critical security patches, nothing else will be patched in old release branches.
